fields.title: **About**
fields.value:
<@719933714423087135>'s main feature is randomizing Civilization picks. Basicaly all players receive a random and unique selection of 1-6 civilizations to choose from.
Currently supported games: Civ5, Civ5+LEK, Civ6.  
If you enable bans players can also **ban** civs, removing them from the pool 
**DLCs** can also be disabled if someone doesn't have some ~~or in case you want to feel the Vanilla experience~~ 
After everyone receives their civs they can vote to reroll. If 70% (can be changed) of players has voted all player will receive a new set to pick from.

fields.title: **Commands**
fields.value: Bot fully relies on Discord's fancy *slash commands*. The command you probably want to start with is `/start`. You can view full list of commands by typing `/` in chat and opening Civilizator tab

fields.title: **Permissions**
fields.value:
By default anyone can use `/start` command. You can create a whitelist of roles, channels and users who would be able to start games.
For more info open Permissions tab of `/settings command`

fields.title: **Bugs, Suggestions, Updates**
fields.value: You can send any suggestions and bugs directly in Bot's DM, [Official Discord server](https://discord.gg/nFMFs2e) or Owner's DM (TriDvaRas#4805)
